p: In obese patients with COVID-19, this hypothesis should be considered. Oral or parenteral Ang1-7 supplementation could be a therapeutic option to diminish the low-grade systemic inflammation due to adipocyte dysfunction and attenuate the severity of ACE2-mediated injuries consecutive to SARS infection. Parenteral Ang1-7 has already been used in human research on account of its property to enhance acetylcholine-mediated vasodilatation in endothelia, with safe outcomes ( 87).
